lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough beat Huddersfield 3-0 on Tuesday to move within a point of English Championship leaders Burnley whose promotion push continued to wobble with a third straight draw.

headline.print_headline: Boro Beat Huddersfield to Close Gap on Burnley
headline.main: Boro Beat Huddersfield to Close Gap on Burnley
